Alright, fairly new to this process and need some help. I have DLed the torrent, mounted and installed it. Now what files do I need to copy where so that I can get the message that I need a Serial Key to play the game to go away. Thanks for any response. 

@cheesedawg
Try to scroll trough the comments and find a tutorial for how to install a game. (it's almost the same for every downloaded game) Here some info that can help you out a bit (I hope ;)
You need to download daemon tools. This program makes your pc think that there is a cd inserted.
When you downloaded daemon tools, open it. Find the option 'mount image'. Then mount the iso file from the torrent. Install the game and use a cd key if there is one in the downloaded file. If not, copy the files from the torrent (the cracked files) into you're folder where you installed the game. (if it asks to replace it, click on 'yes) I hope this helped

if mounting won't work then right click iso and extract files using WinRar then install the game then go to crack folder and right click and copy the rld dll file and the split second file with it and then go to your shortcut and right click then properties the open file location then paste it and copy and replace then create new shortcut to desktop and delete the existing one, you should now be able to play.
